attributes.action: clearly urge Israeli government to allow the free travel of sick palestininans and their supporting families members for life-saving treatments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Palestinians suffering serious illnesses have long travelled from Gaza to nearby Israeli hospitals for treatments unavailable at facilities in the territory.

However,in June Israel has tightened border restrictions, so hundreds  cannot get the care that could save lives.

29 patients had died in the past six months because of this. Hundreds other sick Gazans, of whom  ill patients suffering illnesses such as cancer or chronic kidney failure, have failed to be granted permission.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "clearly urge Israeli government to allow the free travel of sick palestininans and their supporting families members for life-saving treatments"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18331


Prime Minister's Office
